name: bristol-su/api-client
description: An API Client for interacting with the Bristol SU Portal

suggest.symfony/cache: Allows for psr-16 compliant caching of HTTP results
suggest.guzzlehttp/guzzle: A psr compliant HTTP client for making requests
suggest.bristol-su/control-api-client: Extension to the API client for making requests to Control
suggest.TristanPWarren/FlyerlessClubManagementAp: A Flyerless Api Client extension to allow access to club details
